channel.title: Saving error ... - HELP!
channel.description:
Hi People Of Moparscape.
The problem is that when people log off my server like twice then try log bk on it says
[b]ERROR CONNECTIONG TO SERVER[/b]
I don't really know why it does it with me also
I have to reload the runserver.bat so we can get back on
This is what happens
[IMG]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk184/Jazza14/error.jpg[/img]
Thats all i get for hours
If you know what the problem is and willing to help me, please do
My msn name: jamie_lyon_11_cfc_@hotmail.co.uk
Yahoo Messenger: Jazza_ell_fs_2k6
Thanks alot guys,
Bye[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 11:29:12 AM[/size][hr]HELP
